# Auto-Generated gRPC Module

This directory contains auto-generated code from LanguageTool's Protocol Buffer definition (`ml_server.proto`).

## ⚠️ DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY

All files in this directory are auto-generated by `grpc_tools.protoc`. Manual edits will be lost when regenerated.

## Regeneration

To regenerate these files after modifying `ml_server.proto`:

### Option 1: Using the regeneration script (recommended)
```bash
cd ..  # Go to parent directory (api/src/)
python generate_grpc.py
```

This script will:
1. Run the protoc compiler on `ml_server.proto`
2. Fix relative imports in the generated files
3. Handle all necessary setup

### Option 2: Manual regeneration
```bash
cd ..  # Go to parent directory (api/src/)
python -m grpc_tools.protoc -I. --python_out=grpc_gen --pyi_out=grpc_gen --grpc_python_out=grpc_gen ml_server.proto
```

After manual regeneration, update the import in `ml_server_pb2_grpc.py` from:
```python
import grammar_check_pb2 as grammar__check__pb2
```
to:
```python
from . import grammar_check_pb2 as grammar__check__pb2
```

## Files

- `ml_server_pb2.py` - Protocol Buffer message definitions (auto-generated)
- `ml_server_pb2.pyi` - Type stubs for Protocol Buffer messages (auto-generated)
- `ml_server_pb2_grpc.py` - gRPC service definitions (auto-generated)
- `__init__.py` - Module initialization
- `py.typed` - Marker file for type checking support
- `README.md` - This file

## Source

Generated from: `../ml_server.proto` (LanguageTool standard)
